<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Barber](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=448)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 50 <sup>1.1</sup>

 

</column>

Haircuts, dentistry, bloodletting, and surgery—if it takes a steady hand and a razor, you can do it. You may have taken to the road to expand your skills or test yourself against a world that leaves your patients so battered and bruised.

Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Dexterity
or Wisdom, and one is a free attribute boost.

You're trained in the [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) skill, and the [Surgery Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Risky Surgery](/Feats.aspx?ID=2146) skill feat.
